title: Getting Started with rrlmgraph
text: chat_with_context() assembles context sends LLM. Supported providers via ellmer package: call automatically logs query, nodes used, response excerpt .rrlmgraph/task_trace.jsonl inside project root. trace used update_task_weights() boost frequently-referenced nodes future relevance scoring.
code: # OpenAI (default) -- requires OPENAI_API_KEY answer <- chat_with_context(   graph,   "How does prepare_data() ensure clean input?" ) cat(answer)  # GitHub Models Marketplace -- requires GITHUB_PAT answer <- chat_with_context(   graph,   "What does fit_model() return?",   provider = "github",   model    = "gpt-4o-mini" )  # Local Ollama -- no API key needed answer <- chat_with_context(   graph,   "Summarise the prediction pipeline.",   provider = "ollama",   model    = "llama3.2" )  # Anthropic Claude -- requires ANTHROPIC_API_KEY answer <- chat_with_context(   graph,   "Which function calls prepare_data()?",   provider = "anthropic" )

title: Compute composite relevance score for a graph node — compute_relevance
text: Calculate composite relevance score node given query embedding traversal state.  score weighted linear combination four signals:

title: Compute composite relevance score for a graph node — compute_relevance
code: compute_relevance(   node,   query_vec,   visited = character(0),   graph,   weights = getOption("rrlmgraph.weights") )

title: Compute composite relevance score for a graph node — compute_relevance
text: node Character(1).  Name vertex (.e., node_id) score. query_vec Numeric vector.  Dense embedding user query (embed_query()).  Pass numeric(0) disable semantic signal. visited Character vector.  Node names already visited current traversal session.  Used compute co-change signal. Defaults character(0). graph rrlm_graph / igraph object. weights Named list NULL.  non-NULL, overrides corresponding default weight(s).  Recognised names: semantic, pagerank, task_trace, cochange. Falls back getOption("rrlmgraph.weights").

title: Compute composite relevance score for a graph node — compute_relevance
Compute composite relevance score for a graph node — compute_relevance
text: $$   \text{relevance} = 0.40 \cdot \text{sem\_sim}                    + 0.25 \cdot \text{pagerank}                    + 0.25 \cdot \text{task\_trace\_weight}                    + 0.10 \cdot \text{cochange\_score} $$ weights can overridden globally via options(rrlmgraph.weights = list(semantic=, pagerank=, task_trace=, cochange=)).

title: Compute composite relevance score for a graph node — compute_relevance
text: sem_sim Cosine similarity node's TF-IDF () embedding query_vec.  Clamped \([0, 1]\). pagerank Pre-computed pagerank vertex attribute, min-max normalised across full graph \([0, 1]\). task_trace_weight Vertex attribute set update_task_weights() (issue \#13).  Defaults \(0.5\) (neutral) attribute absent NA. cochange_score Mean weight CO_CHANGES edges connecting node already-visited nodes.  Zero visited empty edges exist.

title: Query the rrlm graph and retrieve a token-budgeted context — query_context
text: graph rrlm_graph / igraph object created build_rrlm_graph(). query Character(1).  User query string. seed_node Character(1) NULL.  Name vertex start traversal .  NULL (default) triggers automatic selection: function-type node highest PageRank. budget_tokens Integer(1).  Hard token limit.  Default 2000L. min_relevance Numeric(1).  Minimum relevance score \([0, 1]\) node admitted.  Default 0.1. max_nodes Integer(1).  Maximum number nodes (excluding seed) absorb.  Default 20L. method Character(1) NULL.  Embedding method passed embed_query().  NULL (default) reads "embed_model" graph attribute. verbose Logical(1).  Print progress messages via cli_inform().  Default FALSE.

title: Query the rrlm graph and retrieve a token-budgeted context — query_context
text: named list class c("rrlm_context", "list"): nodes Character vector absorbed node names, relevance-ordered, seed first. context_string Character(1) assembled assemble_context_string(). tokens_used Integer(1).  Approximate token count context_string. budget_tokens Integer(1).  budget used. seed_node Character(1).  seed node name. relevance_scores Named numeric vector relevance scores every absorbed node (seed included).

title: Query the rrlm graph and retrieve a token-budgeted context — query_context
text: Embed query embed_query(). Identify seed node: seed_node NULL, select function-type vertex highest pre-computed PageRank; otherwise validate use supplied name. Initialise visited = {seed} frontier = neighbours(seed). BFS loop tokens_used < budget_tokens frontier non-empty: Score every frontier node compute_relevance(). Select best-scoring node score >= min_relevance. Compute token cost (nchar / 4). Accept node adding stays within budget; otherwise skip try next-best. Mark visited; expand neighbours frontier. Call update_task_weights() update learning trace. Assemble final context string assemble_context_string().

Ollama embedding calls (embed_nodes(), embed_query()) now hit POST /api/embed directly via httr2, removing ollamar dependency entirely (#40).

title: rrlmgraph 0.1.0
text: Graph construction build_rrlm_graph() – build typed knowledge graph R project. update_graph_incremental() – re-parse changed files fast single-file updates. extract_function_nodes() – AST-based function node extraction supporting standard assignments, S4 generics/methods, R5/R6 classes. find_calls_in_body() – enumerate global symbol references function body, filtering NSE false-positives. build_call_edges() – intra-project CALLS edges. build_import_edges() – IMPORTS edges source files package dependencies (library calls, qualified calls, DESCRIPTION fields). build_test_edges() – TEST edges test files user-defined functions. Querying context assembly query_context() – relevance-guided BFS producing token-budgeted context object use LLM. compute_relevance() – composite relevance score (semantic, PageRank, task-trace, co-change). build_node_context() – full compressed text representation single graph node. assemble_context_string() – structured, LLM-ready prompt string ranked node hits. Embedding embed_nodes() – TF-IDF (default), Ollama, OpenAI dense embeddings. embed_query() – project free-text query model’s vector space. cosine_similarity() – cosine similarity two numeric vectors. ollama_available() – runtime check reachable Ollama daemon. LLM interface chat_with_context() – chat LLM using graph-derived context; uses ellmer installed, falls back httr2. Task learning log_task_trace() – append JSONL feedback entry .rrlmgraph/task_trace.jsonl. update_task_weights() – apply exponential decay accumulate per-node weights trace file. update_task_polarity() – rewrite polarity values recent trace entries. Cache export save_graph_cache() – serialise graph .rrlmgraph/graph.rds. load_graph_cache() – restore graph cache, refreshing task weights. is_cache_stale() – compare cache mtime R source files. export_to_sqlite() – write nodes, edges, traces SQLite database TypeScript MCP server. Project detection detect_rproject() – detect project type discover R source files. Instructions generate_instructions() – generate Copilot-style instruction Markdown file project graph. S3 methods print.rrlm_graph(), summary.rrlm_graph(), plot.rrlm_graph() print.rrlm_context(), summary.rrlm_context()
